This game has gotten better and better after the Operation Riptide Update. If you have enough money to purchase the Prime Status, then you MUST! Cause you will be able to start being more ''competitive'' as you are getting your own Competitive Rank after winning 10 matches. You can easily fast track your way into the game by playing 'Short Matches'' which are >15' games. The game has very little cheaters. The overall experience is great, 

I'd appreciate it if you awarded me. LOVEE <33
